descriptionlist.longdescription:
Notifications:
· Choose the location of the transparency effect
· Adjust notification banner opacity incrementally
· Change the color of notification content (black/white)
· Hide the app name
· Hide the time of arrival
· Hide the "No older notifications" text on the lockscreen
· Hide the stock charging indicator on the lockscreen

Widgets:
· Adjust background platter opacity incrementally
· Change the widget content color (black/white)
· Hide the footer "information provided by" text(s)
· Hide widget app icon
· Hide widget label
